subject: Re: Samba TP6?
body:
Ok, then.  By all means go for it.  I am psyched to try adding users via 
MMC and maybe a GPO.  This will be mad cool.

Andrew Bartlett wrote:
> On Thu, 2007-06-21 at 08:19 -0500, Matt Schwartz wrote:
>> While I like the idea of having another tech preview released, I would
>> rather see energies placed on releasing an alpha.  Preparation for the
>> TP would divert energy and resources from continued development.  I
>> believe that at this point, the community would be best served when
>> Samba4 reaches alpha.  More testing can be done.  Great job, all!
> 
> For reference: the energies and resources is mostly a week of my time,
> based on past experience.  2/3 of that seems to go into fixing SWAT
> (which always seems to get broken, does anybody run it?) and anything
> the build farm shows up, and the rest into preparing a from-scratch
> build and test on an end-user platform (ie, not my devel box). 
> 
> Andrew Bartlett
>
